languages.text: "Твои речи сияют золотом и янтарем, сестра. Когда-нибудь я научусь веровать в правоту своих слов с той же силой, что и ты".
"Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."
languages.original_text: "Твои речи сияют золотом и янтарем, сестра. Когда-нибудь я научусь веровать в правоту своих слов с той же силой, что и ты".

traits.locale_text: "Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."
"Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."
"Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."
"Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."

languages.text: “你的演讲闪耀着黄金与琥珀般的光芒，修女。有朝一日，我也会对我言语中的正义充满决心，就像你一样。”
languages.original_text: "Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."

traits.locale_text: “你的演讲闪耀着黄金与琥珀般的光芒，修女。有朝一日，我也会对我言语中的正义充满决心，就像你一样。”

languages.text: « Vos paroles brillent d'un éclat doré et ambré, ma sœur. J'espère pouvoir un jour avoir autant foi en ce que je dis que vous. »
languages.original_text: "Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles brillent d'un éclat doré et ambré, ma sœur. J'espère pouvoir un jour avoir autant foi en ce que je dis que vous. »

languages.text: "Gold und Bernstein glänzen in Euren Worten, Schwester. Eines Tages werde ich lernen, ebenso überzeugt von der Richtigkeit meiner Wort zu sein wie Ihr von der Eurer Worte."
languages.original_text: "Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."

traits.locale_text: "Gold und Bernstein glänzen in Euren Worten, Schwester. Eines Tages werde ich lernen, ebenso überzeugt von der Richtigkeit meiner Wort zu sein wie Ihr von der Eurer Worte."

languages.text: 「あなたのスピーチは金色と琥珀色に輝いています、シスター。いつか私もあなたのように、自分の言葉の正しさを強く信じられるようになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのスピーチは金色と琥珀色に輝いています、シスター。いつか私もあなたのように、自分の言葉の正しさを強く信じられるようになるでしょう」

languages.text: «Sus palabras rebosan oro y ámbar, hermana. Espero que algún día pueda creer tanto en la rectitud de mis palabras como usted en la de las suyas».
languages.original_text: "Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras rebosan oro y ámbar, hermana. Espero que algún día pueda creer tanto en la rectitud de mis palabras como usted en la de las suyas».

languages.original_text: "Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."

languages.text: "Sözlerin altın ve kehribar renginde ışıldıyor Rahibe. Bir gün ben de kendi sözlerimdeki doğruluğa senin kadar inanmayı öğreneceğim."
languages.original_text: "Your speeches shine with gold and amber, Sister. Someday I will learn to believe in the rectitude of my words as strongly as you do yours."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerin altın ve kehribar renginde ışıldıyor Rahibe. Bir gün ben de kendi sözlerimin samimiyetine senin kadar inanmayı öğreneceğim."
